about_the_game:
"Legal by Day, Dangerous by Night: Step into the Dark World with "Illegal Simulator"!



Do you appear as an ordinary market operator during the day? Are you ready to shed that
innocent image at night and become the kingpin of the underworld? "Illegal Simulator"
thrusts you right into the heart of the dark dealings hidden behind a legal facade.

While you fill the shelves and serve customers with a smile during the day, at night,
you'll rake in big bucks as the owner of an underground casino, engaging in high-stakes games.
But in this world, it's not just about luck; strategy and courage are also required.
You'll negotiate with mafia gangs, battle your competitors, and organize the harvest of banned substances.

In this world, you're after not only money but also fame.
Be cautious as you conduct your affairs, as the police could be on your tail at any moment.

With the option to play with two players, you can share this excitement with a friend.
Climbing to the top of the underworld together, devising strategies, has never been this fun.
With "Illegal Simulator," be a innocent businessperson by day and the ruler of the dark world by night!



Vehicle Handling Skills:
Embark on a real journey with your vehicle handling skills in your game! Enhance your driving abilities and swiftly navigate through the city.

Charisma:
Charisma is everything in Illegal Simulator! Influence your clients, defeat your competitors, and boost your prestige in the underworld using your charisma.

Expansion of Territory:
It's time to expand your business in Illegal Simulator! Leave your competitors behind with more space and larger warehouses.

VIP Rooms:
Spoil your clients with VIP rooms and strengthen your position in the underworld! Offer luxury services and increase your income.

Strip Club Area:
Entertain your clients and organize live performances to increase your income.

Additional Revenue Streams:
Invest in additional revenue streams to diversify your income. Take risks, make strategic decisions, and explore new opportunities to build your underworld empire.

content_descriptors.notes:
Our game features adult content, including:

Violence: There are scenes of violence in the game, depicting conflicts or confrontations between characters.

Drug Cultivation: The game includes illegal activities such as drug cultivation and trafficking by characters. However, these activities are purely fictional, and no real information is provided.

Sexuality: There are some mild sexual scenes in the game, often depicted in strip clubs or similar venues.

By sharing this information, we aim to help players make informed decisions about the content.

name: Illegal Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better

short_description: "Illegal Simulator" puts you in the midst of two different lives. While running a legal market during the day, you'll manage illegal casinos and harvest banned substances at night. Collaborate with mafia gangs, have fun at strip clubs, and become the most famous figure in the underworld!
supported_languages: English, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Vietnamese, Czech, Swedish
